name: Bleeding DoT
description: Bleeding wound that deals physical damage over time.

name: Frozen
description: Frozen solid, preventing all movement and actions.

name: Burning DoT
description: Flaming burn that deals fire damage over time.

name: Venom DoT
description: Venomous poison that deals nature damage over time.

name: Shadow Corruption
description: Corrupting shadow energy that saps life.

name: Stunned
description: Stunned and incapacitated, unable to act.

name: Blind Rebuke
description: Reduced critical strike chance after block.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Lightning damage jumps to nearby targets.
